translations: 【名】 （Allot）（英）阿洛特，（西）阿略特，（法）阿洛（人名）

sentences.sentence: It is suggested that 5,000-6,000 years ago people in the Middle East and North Africa started to allot specific lengths of time to tasks.
sentences.translation: 据说，在5000至6000年前，中东和北非的人们开始分配特定时间段来完成任务。

sentences.sentence: Allot regular funding to most departments.
sentences.translation: 给大多数部门分配固定的资金。

sentences.sentence: Enquiries are so large that we can only than allot you 200 cases.
sentences.translation: 询盘如此之多，我们只能分给你们200箱货。
